website_summaries.verdict: Tall blocking dummy pad with a round shape that makes it perfect for certain football drills.
pros: Available in multiple lengths and weights so you can pick the right model for your team
Works nicely for other contact sports too
Because of the round shape, you can practice certain drills better than is possible with a rectangular shaped pad
cons: Heavier and larger than most blocking pads, so it may not work well for younger players

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag...Great Quality. Bag was triple wrapped to protect in during shipping...paper, vinyl burlap, and plastic bag. Weight is perfect for combination of blocking and tackling drills. Is balanced well so it will free stand on its own without falling. We have previously purchased leather wrestling dummies and the quality of this bag is on par with those at a fraction of the cost. Was very surprised by this but would recommend this product for any age up thru high school.
customer_reviews.author: Roseville Parents

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My 6 year old son is constantly attacking it to the point that it is driving my wife crazy! Got it for practicing football but so far it has just been getting body slammed, elbowed, punched, and kicked.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 8 yr old playing tackle to practice at home. Heavy duty vinyl. Tall and heavy enough for high school players. It's gotten his confidence up tremendously "learning" how to hit, wrap up and take down an opponent.
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great for football!  Made great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for practicing football tactics at home with the kids. When they don't get enough practice in with the team, they can now practice at home. Made of good material, good craftsmanship, and worth the money. Took a bit longer to get than what I expected, but understandable due to the items shape/size, etc.
customer_reviews.author: me2007

customer_reviews.title: Down, set, GET SOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I coach a flag football team and both the team and my kids love it. Good tough quality, light enough to to transport to and from the fields easily, cleans off easy!
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN S.

customer_reviews.title: the handles get on the way
customer_reviews.text: It's a great dummy except I'd prefer it to be completely flush at least on one side as opposed to having 3 handles around the top
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product, good weight to it
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, good weight to it, stands on its own or can be moved. It seems well made. Only negative is that it has 4 handles around the top so when used for blocking player tends to grab handles for leverage. 2 would have been sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Got this to each my son how to properly tackle. It's firm and light weight tough durable material and easy to clean. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Pro Down blocking dummy
customer_reviews.text: My son love this. It is very durable. We hooked it up to a zip line in the yard and he and his friends love running into it and knocking it down.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and nice quality! Works great for my son and the one on one training we do with tackling with him. Had helped him be more confidant and perform better during games and practice!
customer_reviews.author: Urbanbella801

customer_reviews.title: Tackling Dummy
customer_reviews.text: Great item for a wanna-be NFL football player. Small enough for my 11 year old to play with inside when its cold, yet tough enough for as designed use outside.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Heesacker

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year-old. He enjoys hitting it and it helps him get the basics of hitting and tackling. I wish I had gotten the heavier one, though. Even my 6 year-old knocks this down and back a little too easily. I may go ahead and buy the 20 pounder, also. Overall, it is a good purchase. Seems sturdy; I've only had it for a month and haven't any long term experience with it, yet.
customer_reviews.author: bbm

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted or expected.
customer_reviews.text: I am a recreation football coach. I ordered a pro down tackle dummy. We'll I coach 11 and 12 yr olds. When it came I was very disappointed. It's too small for my kids to use! But it's great for 6,7,8 or 9 yr olds. My kids are too big to use it. So make sure you check the size before you order one. The one I have 3 to 4 ft tall. I had to go to dicks sporting goods to buy the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius Mitchell

product_meta.title: Pro Down Round Blocking Dummy
product_meta.description: Pro Down 200235311 Round Blocking Dummy 13" X 38" 10 lb (EA) Blue
feature_bullets: Pro Down Round Blocking Dummy 13" X 38" 10 lb (EA)
